nodes.text: Burnout was a space station in the Thaereian system that orbited Zham Hlar. During the Clone Wars, the Thaereian military kept an Acklay there and fed prisoners to it. The Heroes of Cularin landed there to refuel, but the Thaereian Intelligence agent Xirossk sabotaged their ship and when they tracked him, tried to defect to Cularin.
